channel.title: Help please
channel.description:
I have got my source - Its deltascape.
I have downloaded the moperscape client.
How do i get the source up and running on the client. Like, do i need to sign up to any sites or anything. I mean, just playing on my own.
So, i have kept the IP the default, because i am just going to test it privatly. However how do i run the source on the server. And make myself admin ect.

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @neobug134 neobug134
item.description:
@neobug134 wrote:

run this program and let me know what this says

MediaFire

Java EV Setter.zip

MediaFire is a simple to use free service that lets you put all your photos, documents, music, and video in a single place so you can access them anywhere and share them everywhere.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @MobilScape MobilScape
item.description:
@MobilScape wrote:

When i click “run” which is the BATCH file. A black box flashes up for like 2 seconds then dissapears.

How can i fix this?

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @neobug134 neobug134
item.description:
@neobug134 wrote:

well to get the source up just go folder cmd and run something like runeserver or run or something like that

make urself admin are very much guides about just look in the tutorial section

and if u want to loggin to ur own server in privat use 127.0.0.1

hope this helps

Read full topic
